original: <color=#fff999>$leader1</color>竟拒絕本王招募，來日定要教訓一番，使其下跪求饒！(<color=#bceea7>招募失敗</color>)
text: <color=#fff999>$leader1</color> actually refused to be recruited by the king. In the coming day, he must have a lesson and make him kneel and beg for mercy! (<color=#bceea7>Recruitment failed</color>)
